Package io.github.izdwuut.yarl.controllers

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.izdwuut.yarl.controllers.Controller
      • io.github.izdwuut.yarl.controllers.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends Controller
    Main controller. Handles input applicable to GameScreen, which is used to display map and message log.
    Since:
    2017-11-18
    Author:
    Bartosz "izdwuut" Konikiewicz

    • Field Detail

      • game

        private YARL game
        A game class.

      • player

        private Creature player
        A player entity.

      • screen

        private GameScreen screen
        A screen that is used by YARL to render stuff. GameController is only responsible for constructing it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameController

        public GameController​(YARL game,
                      com.badlogic.ashley.core.Engine engine,
                      World world,
                      Settings settings)
        Takes as parameters every Entity needed to build a GameScreen. It also takes YARL object (used in init method to set current screen) and an Ashley Engine. When parameters are assigned to appropriate fields, an init method is invoked to perform further actions needed to build the GameController.
        Parameters:
        game - a main game object
        engine - an Ashley engine
        world - a world entity
        settings - world settings
